p:
Errors and uncertainties in SDM output may occur for a variety of reasons, including limitations in occurrence data
51, 52 , selection of background points
53, 54 , spatial resolution, extent of the study area, and selection of predictor variables
55 . To minimise model errors, we (1) reduced the number of variables by assessing collinearity, (2) examined spatial autocorrelation and sampling bias before modelling, and (3) extracted background points from areas situated within 200â€‰km of Qfly occurrences.
